scripts.build: babel --auxiliary-comment 'istanbul ignore next' --source-maps-inline --out-dir dist src --presets es2015
scripts.build-browser: npm run build && browserify -s complexity -o dist/shift-complexity.js dist/index.js
scripts.watch: babel --auxiliary-comment 'istanbul ignore next' --source-maps-inline --out-dir dist src --watch --presets es2015
